snippet: A lab-created bird flu virus needs to be destroyed, or better contained, and future research closely reviewed.
abstract: Editorial asserts that unless the scientific community and health officials can provide more persuasive justifications than they have, the deadly avian flu virus created by scientists funded by the National Institutes of Health should be destroyed or put in a few government-controlled laboratories with the highest containment rating; argues that in the future it is imperative that any such experiments be rigorously analyzed for potential dangers before they are undertaken.
lead_paragraph: A lab-created bird flu virus needs to be destroyed, or better contained, and future research closely reviewed.
